sentences: Meie lipu v√§rvid on must ja punane.
context: The word 'punased' is the plural nominative form of the Estonian adjective 'punane', meaning 'red'. It describes multiple red items or things that are red in color. In Estonian, adjectives agree with nouns in number and case. 'Punased' specifically refers to multiple red objects (plural) and is used in the nominative case.
